name: Monster Smash (Lazy Mutt Games)
description:
Monster Smash is a Match 3 game where you smash monsters, gain points, and move through an infinite number of levels.  See if you can beat your high score or high level.  Play a normal game without the timer, or select timed game to add more challange.

The game runs in a 830 x 650 windowed screen.

Just download the Zip file to a folder of your choice, and run the short-cut!

Or if you just want to play the game online, visit Lazy Mutt Games online arcade: https://lazymuttgames.com/games/Monster-Smash/

Stop over and check us out at Lazy Mutt Games!
